turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey I need you to order some pizza for me.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No problem, where did you want it from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Get it from Pizza Classics.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure thing, what would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Get me a large canadian bacon and pineapple pizza.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Did you want any sides with it?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, just the pizza.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok when did you need it?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: On second thought make it two large canadian bacon and pineapple pizzas.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright. So two large pineapple and canadian bacon pizzas with no side, right?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes that's right.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright when did you need them?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I need them by 7 pm.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright 7 pm. Where should I send them?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Send them to the main field office.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright so two large canadian bacon and pinapple pizzas sent to the main field office by 7 pm. Is that all correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes it's all correct.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: All right I'll get that taken care of for you right away.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You're welcome. I'll let you know when they're ready.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: So there was a slight problem with the order.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: What was that?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: They are out of pineapple. Did you wanna order something else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I guess just add banana peppers.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Anything in case they don't have those?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, just the canadian bacon if there's anymore issues.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright, so the order went through and will be ready for pickup in 25 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Ok thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You're welcome.
